description: Enable AI assistants to manage and monitor song requests and queues for streamers seamlessly. Interact with StreamerSongList APIs to fetch streamer info, queue stats, and control song requests. Simplify music request management for streaming platforms without requiring authentication.

tools.name: getStreamerByName
tools.description: Fetch detailed information about a specific streamer

tools.name: getQueue
tools.description: View current song queues with pagination support

limit.description: Maximum number of songs to return (default: 50)

offset.description: Number of songs to skip for pagination (default: 0)

streamerName.description: The name of the streamer whose queue to fetch

tools.name: monitorQueue
tools.description: Monitor queue changes with configurable polling intervals

duration.description: How long to monitor in seconds (default: 300)

streamerName.description: The name of the streamer whose queue to monitor

tools.name: getSongs
tools.description: Fetch the complete song list for a streamer with pagination support

limit.description: Maximum number of songs to return (default: 100)

offset.description: Number of songs to skip for pagination (default: 0)

streamerName.description: The name of the streamer whose song list to fetch

tools.name: searchSongs
tools.description: Search within a streamer's song list by title or artist

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 20)

query.description: Search query to match against song titles and artists

streamerName.description: The name of the streamer whose songs to search

tools.name: getSongDetails
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific song by ID

songId.description: The ID of the song to fetch details for

streamerName.description: The name of the streamer who owns the song

defaultStreamer.description: Default streamer name to use when not specified
